```{r}

library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(sf)
library(here)
library(readr)
library(lubridate)


i_am("scripts/open_data_exploration.qmd")

```


```{r}

dta_311 <- read_csv(here("data/311.csv"))

```


```{r}

dta_311_recent <- dta_311 %>%
  filter(`Date Created` >= ymd("2024-01-01"))

```


```{r}

most_common_311 <- dta_311 %>%
  group_by(`Request Type`) %>%
  summarise(
    count = n()
  )

```


```{r}

permits <- readr::read_csv(here("data/Permits_20250724.csv"))

```
